patterns: Tell me about the courses in Gujarat Vidyapith
responses: We offer undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma, and PhD programs in various disciplines including Arts, Science, Education, Social Work, Rural Studies, and Management.
Programs include BA, B.Sc, B.Ed, MA, M.Sc, M.Ed, MBA, MSW, M.Phil, and Ph.D.

patterns: How much is the admission fee?
responses: The fee structure varies by program. You can check the detailed fee structure on the official Gujarat Vidyapith admission page.
Fees are kept affordable since Gujarat Vidyapith is a deemed university established by Mahatma Gandhi, but exact details depend on the course.

patterns: Can I get a fee waiver?
